allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
hide marketplace feature and update navigation

- Remove Store tab from bottom navigation
- Remove recommended products and market sections from home page
- Replace BuySheet add-to-cart with navigate to home
- Make app bar logo clickable to navigate to home

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix build errors with lazy initialization for Stripe and OpenAI

- Update Stripe API version to 2025-08-27.basil
- Use lazy initialization for Stripe and OpenAI clients to avoid
  build-time errors when env vars are not available
- Fixes build failures on Vercel deployment

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
